title: Welcome to my veterinary practice for acupuncture and chiropractic
author: Fruitmedia Shopsoftware
description: Die tierärztliche Praxis für Akupunktur und Chiropraktik: Mit ganzheitlichem Therapieansatz, Betreuungs- und Vorsorgekonzept und durch das individuelle Zusammenspiel von Akupunktur, Akupressur, Chiropraktik, Cranio Sakraler Therapie und Lasertherapie können überzeugende Erfolge erzielt werden.
text:
Welcome to my veterinary practice for acupuncture and chiropractic
Your horse's health and well-being are
a prerequesite for the satisfaction and fulfilment which you would like to enjoy in its company. To maintain your
horse's fitness, health and proficiency,
I have developed a comprehensive combination of care and preventive measures. They are based on the
principle of keeping your horse under observation even before symptoms appear and responding promptly at the first signs of any imbalance. To this end I combine various different approaches in my veterinary practice: the millennia old Chinese medical tradition together with manual therapy and classical veterinary medicine. In view of the phenomenal successes which I have witnessed in recent years, I have become a wholehearted advocate of acupuncture and chiropractic - it is extremely gratifying to see how effectively horses can be helped using these techniques, often in cases which have already been given up as hopeless. The secret of success lies in the carefully tailored combination of acupuncture, acupressure, chiropractic, cranio-sacral therapy and laser therapy.
